column1: #Text=" Bumi says : " All right guys , rescue time .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Bumi , how did you manage to take out this entire encampment on your own ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " I did it all with my trusty flute and ... ah , never mind , you would n't believe it anyway .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " You run into the portal , I 'll try to hold off anyone who comes after you .
#Text=" Korra says : " No , you 're too hurt , you need a healer .
#Text=Asami , can you take Oogi and my dad back to my mom ?
#Text=" Korra says : " This is my fight now .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Korra , I love you .
#Text=" Korra says : " I love you too , Dad .
